metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4944 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 29.0.0.140 and earlier have an exploitable type confusion vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 29.0.0.171ubuntu1
flashplugin-installer - 29.0.0.171ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '29.0.0.171ubuntu1').
